reviews.title: Excited to smell the sense
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I haven't used the shampoo yet because I'm currently using the birthday scented shampoo, but I intend on using it very soon. I'm so excited to smell the scent on my hair and in the air when I'm taking a shower, so excited to add some fall sense into my bathing routine..

reviews.title: Best shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Smells great! Moisturizes my hair perfectly! Lathers beautifully! Since I started using Native's shampoo and conditioners I won't use anything else!

reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with the larger and smell to the native products! Will be purchasing again!
I love that the product is paraben/sulfate-free. My hair has shown drastic improvement with less than three washings, and it looks thicker too.

reviews.title: Hello, pumpkin!
reviews.review_text: Great scent! Smells like fall but in a light, refreshing way. Not overly scented like many other pumpkin scents out there.

reviews.title: pumpkin S&C
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It's overall and good shampoo and conditioner but I'm just not a fan of the scent it doesn't smell like pumpkin

reviews.title: Pass
reviews.review_text: It smells bad to me , it smells like a cigar . It doesnt give vanilla , pumpkin or caramel . The smell is strong. The brand is good and i do enjoy their other products.

reviews.title: Hint of vomit
reviews.review_text: I've never fully disliked any scent I've tried from native. Some I didn't love, but not hate. This one very weirdly has a hint of vomit smell. I don't understand it- and my family smells it too. It starts off almost pumpkin then bam, vomit scent in the middle. Weird enough for me to actually do a review.

reviews.title: smells like sour yogurt
reviews.review_text: i ordered for the reviews that said it reminded them of fall. not sure why. this doesnt smell like pumpkin or cream and it sure as heck dont smell like vanilla lol. smells like chemicals and sour yogurt
Saw an ad for this and was excited I could get it online for a great price.

reviews.title: Lacking pumpkin
reviews.review_text: Just smells like a vanilla cupcake or something.. needs more pumpkin. Disappointed.

reviews.title: PUMPKIN YES!!
reviews.review_text: I have gifted these products to all my Pumpkin loving friends and they are super excited.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: I love this smell i enjoy it so much reminds me of fall

reviews.title: Unpleasant smell
reviews.review_text: This product line has an awful odor. It smells like rancid baby food.

reviews.title: Delicious smells
reviews.review_text: Love all there products smell good and work like expensive products

reviews.title: Chemical burn
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it but unfortunately it gave me chemical burns. Waste of $10 .

reviews.title: Great shampoo, wish the scent lasted longer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo scent is vanilla cream and pumpkin, and I think it smells pretty true to that. It smells like fresh pumpkin with undertones of vanilla. The only real downfall is that it is not an overly strong scent. It is not one of those scents that fill the shower when you use it or lingers around afterwards. There are pros and cons to that, especially if you are someone or are around someone who has allergies to scents a lot. I personally wish it was stronger, but it is still a good scent. As a shampoo it is great. Leaves my hair feeling clean and soft overall. It lathered well and rinsed out easily. I will say that the pump is not labeled to tell you which way to turn it to unlock it, not a major issue, but something to keep in mind. If you have used native hair products in the past this one is no different. So if the scent sounds good to you I would recommend trying it out, especially with the upcoming fall season.

reviews.title: Lathers well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received the native shampoo and conditioner complementary through influencer for my honest review. It lathers well has a nice smell however, the smell of pumpkin is in a strong as the vanilla and cinnamon and clove. The conditioner leaves my hair soft. Packaging is simple and clean.

reviews.title: Great product without the junk!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo was awesome! The smell was great without being too overwhelming and the fact that I could read all the ingredients in the label was very important to me. The bottle was huge so you definitely get an excellent value. I have coarse 4b hair that is chemically relaxed and this shampoo made it feel soft and smooth!

reviews.title: 10/10 üòã
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Native Hair Care Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin shampoo is a great match to the conditioner, especially for those who enjoy seasonal scents. It lathers nicely without using harsh sulfates, so it cleans the hair effectively without leaving it dry or stripped. The fragrance is warm and comforting, adding a cozy touch to your shower routine. I appreciate that it's silicone-free, sulfate-free, and paraben-free, which makes it feel gentle and safe for everyday use. The pump bottle is sleek and easy to use, though like the conditioner, it might be tricky when it gets near empty. Overall, it's a refreshing shampoo that pairs perfectly with the conditioner to leave hair clean, soft, and smelling amazing.

reviews.title: Smells so good I could eat my hair!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The smell of this shampoo is unreal! It's perfect for a pumpkin spice fall, and the scent lasts a good amount of time in my hair. The only thing is that I think my hair will need to be washed more frequently because it has been getting greasier sooner. However, for the clean ingredients, soft hair, and great smell, I would repurchase!

reviews.title: Fantastic Shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love the scent! Reminds me of Autumn. The packaging is sleek. Overall it worked nicely. It rinsed well without leaving a weird residue on my hair. I have very frizzy hair and it helped tame it. I was very impressed with this product.

reviews.title: Soft, Nourished, and Delightfully Scented!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using Native Hair Care's Moisturizing Shampoo in Vanilla Cream, and Pumpkin, and I'm seriously impressed. From the first wash, my hair felt soft, hydrated, and so easy to manage. The scent is warm and comforting‚Äînot overpowering, just cozy and sweet. I love that it lathers nicely without feeling harsh or stripping my hair. Perfect for everyday use, especially if your hair tends to get dry. Definitely a new staple in my hair care routine!

reviews.title: Cleans well!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The packaging is simple and clearly tells you what each of the ingredients are! It suds up very well and my hair feels very clean afterwards. The scent isn't the best, I may just not be a fan of this specific scent, but I didn't really care for it.

reviews.title: I love how they leave my hair shiny
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] First of all, I love the scent of these products. They have a sweet, delicious aroma, and the softness and shine they leave in my hair are incredible. I've been using them for a week now, and I love how they leave my hair shiny, soft, and silky. I hope they continue to leave my hair like this.

reviews.title: üëçüèª
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product free for my honest review. I didn't really get any vanilla scent from this shampoo but that's ok because it still smells really good. My hair felt nice and clean after using it

reviews.title: Natural clean
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Overall I really enjoyed this shampoo. It lathered nicely and made my hair feel nice and clean. The packaging is nice with the pumps. And I had no issues opening it. Overall good product. I wasn't a huge fan of the scent but it wasn't too strong.

reviews.title: Cozy Fall Hair Care Must-Have: Native's Vanilla Pu
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love the Native Vanilla Pumpkin Shampoo and Conditioner! The shampoo lathers beautifully‚Äîrich and foamy without needing a ton of product‚Äîand it makes my hair feel so clean without stripping it. The scent is incredible, like a warm, cozy pumpkin dessert with a touch of creamy vanilla. Every wash feels like a little seasonal treat. The conditioner leaves my hair soft, smooth, and manageable, and the fragrance lingers just enough to feel fresh all day. For the quality and the clean ingredients, the value is outstanding. I'll definitely be stocking up before the season ends!

reviews.title: Terrible Scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Just like with the conditioner, the scent is so nauseating and strong for me. Smells too much like the cheap holiday candles you can find everywhere. I still love Natove products and the lather and moisturizing ability are still good quality. It's just the scent that's a big no for me.

reviews.title: Soft scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this shampoo and conditioner! The vanilla and pumpkin scent is super soft‚Äînot too strong at all. I'm not a big pumpkin fan, but this one won me over. Even my husband, who normally doesn't like vanilla, loves it!

reviews.title: Smells amazing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] First off, the scent is absolutely amazing, smells like fall in a bottle! It's a nice semi clear shampoo that lathers very well. I did two pumps and it was a tad too much so keep that in mind. Rinsed out fairly easily and hair felt clean. My only complaint is opening the pump. There are no instructions and it does not open like a typical pump. You have to hold the middle piece in place while twisting and looking at the bottle , you would not think you'd have to do this. Some directions on the bottle would have been helpful.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really enjoy this body wash! smells amazing and creates a rich lather. It leaves my skin feeling soft and refreshed without any residue. Since I have dry skin, I was surprised that after using it, I didn't need to apply lotion.

reviews.title: Clean, Soft, and Smells Like Heaven
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo is such a win. The scent is cozy and delicious without being too sweet, and it actually lingers just enough to make my hair smell fresh all day. It lathers really well for a clean wash but doesn't strip my hair or leave it feeling dry.

reviews.title: Great shampoo with a nice fall scent.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product had a very strong vanilla cream & pumpkin flavor but once your hair dries it's not super overpowering that it gives you a headache. I feel like this cleaned my hair & scalp sufficiently and didn't dry me out. The packaging of this product need to be worked on as it was very difficult to pop the pump out but once you were able to do so it worked fine.

reviews.title: I liked it !
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really enjoyed using this product. It did the job it left my hair feeling so soft and the smell was really soft and subtle. You can tell it was pumpkin spice, but it wasn't as strong and nasty as some other products.

reviews.title: absolute delight
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Native Vanilla Cream and Pumpkin Shampoo is an absolute delight! Its creamy texture lathers beautifully, leaving hair soft, shiny, and nourished. The subtle pumpkin aroma blended with vanilla feels cozy and refreshing. A perfect shampoo for a luxurious, natural hair care routine!

reviews.title: Bad pump, good shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this shampoo a lot. It lathers really nicely and cleans effectively. Doesn't leave my hair feeling stripped or brittle. The scent is not overpowering, not much of a pumpkin scent to me. It smells like a sweet light vanilla more than anything. I don't know if my set of bottles were a dud, but I had the hardest time getting the pump to start working. The pump would not pop up for me to be able to start using the product.

reviews.title: A gentle, cozy-scented shampoo that cleans effecti
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Shampoo smells amazing‚Äîwarm, cozy, and perfect for fall. It lathers nicely without needing a lot of product, and it cleans my hair well without stripping it or leaving it dry. I love that it feels gentle and uses clean ingredients while still being effective. The packaging is sturdy and easy to use in the shower, and paired with the conditioner, it leaves my hair feeling soft, refreshed, and smelling delicious all day.

reviews.title: My favorite shampoo & conditioner brand!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Native has done it again!! I am absolutely obsessed with this new line of shampoo and conditioner. I was definitely a little hesitant on the vanilla cream & pumpkin scent but it's not overpowering. The scent is just right, very nice and sweet! The packing is sleek just as it always is and it works like a charm on my hair type! Definitely recommend‚ù§Ô∏è Also to add this shampoo doesn't dry out my hair like a lot of other brands do.

reviews.title: Smells super delicious!!!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really enjoyed the Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Native shampoo! I have issues with oily and dry hair, so a good shampoo is something I'm always looking for. The scent isn't super overpowering, but it's sweet like honey and pumpkin. I liked that it cleansed my hair very nicely without stripping it of all its natural oils. I really recommend this product if you haven't tried it, for the price I think this great!

reviews.title: The Scent is Terrible
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this free through Influenster for my honest review. I typically love this brand. This conditioner does great for the purpose of cleaning my hair and leaving it moisturized. Packaging is easy to use and pump out the product. The scent however is terrible, it does not smell like pumpkin or vanilla.

reviews.title: Luxurious Lather
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] After my first attempt with Native shampoo and conditioner, I figured the scent of this one had to be better. Was it EVER!!! The scent is delicious and not overpowering. It does not have the chemical-leaning aroma of the Dunkin products. I love the lather on this shampoo. It's creamy and coats the scalp nicely. My hair is curly and on the drier side and this shampoo is the perfect balance for its needs. I am sold on Native shampoo and will willingly try other scents in future!

reviews.title: Definitely worth it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The pumpkin and vanilla scent isn't quite what I expected‚Äîit's not bad, just a little different. However, this shampoo and conditioner really impressed me with how well they moisturize and lather. My hair feels soft, clean, and refreshed after each use. The bottles are big, making it a great value, and I appreciate the minimal ingredient list for a simpler formula. Overall, it may not be my favorite scent, but the quality and performance definitely make it worth it.

reviews.title: Doesn't Smell like Pumpkin...
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Not a fan of this scent at all and quite frankly, I feel very disappointed in this year's fall lineup. Not a hint of pumpkin, vanilla or maple like the notes are described to be. It's musky more than anything which just isn't my type of scent to use. My husband didn't even like the smell of the shampoo. To him, he said it smelled like spoiled yogurt. Usually we like Native products and while I love the idea of Vanilla Cream and Pumpkin, to me the execution wasn't there. I was really hoping for a pumpkin cupcake kind of scent given the description but nope. Better luck next time, Native...

reviews.title: Nice shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this shampoo, it smells so good. Not sure if it smells like pumpkin, but it smells like fall. It didn't make my hair feel dry or oily. The price isn't bad for size and I like that it's a clean product.

reviews.title: Effective moisturizing shampoo with a lovely fall
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I recently received Native's Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Moisturizing Shampoo for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review and I absolutely loved this product. This shampoo has a smooth texture that lathers over the hair effortlessly. One pump of this shampoo can lather over a large portion of your hair. This shampoo does a great job at removing the daily buildup of oils and dirt in your hair while also not striping it of all hydration completely. It actually is very effective at cleaning the hair without being striping and instead providing moisture. The scent is a major pro of this shampoo as it has a lovely fall scent of vanilla cream and pumpkin that is so beautiful. The packaging is also great as this shampoo container has a fair amount of shampoo and the pump dispenser releases the perfect amount with each pump. I definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a beautifully scented moisturizing shampoo that comes at an affordable price.

reviews.title: Nourishing shampoo with safe ingredients!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Native brand products because they use completely risk-free ingredients. The Native Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Moisturizing Shampoo is just as impressive. Every time I wash my hair it's like a cozy, spa-like experience, since this shampoo smells like fresh pumpkin pie. The pump on this shampoo is convenient for perfect distribution, and I think Native shampoo delivers excellent value for the cost, especially when compared to high-end brands. After using it, my hair feels thoroughly cleaned, soft, and well-moisturized every time!

reviews.title: Moisturized
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My first impression of this shampoo is the beautiful vanilla and pumpkin smell. How can a product smell so good. Completely my type. It goes smooth on my hair and leave the scent for long time. It moisturizes hair well but may need to double wash your hair if you have dandruff scalp. Love it!!

reviews.title: Omg the smell of sweet fall!!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Native vanilla cream and pumpkin shampoo is a good staple to add to your hair routine. It has a great scent. I personally really like it. It didn't leave my hair oily and after three days of not washing it still looked great. My hair felt so soft after using this and the matching conditioner. I also like that it is considered a clean product free of all the bad stuff. Id definitely say this product it's worth it and it's basically a full size shampoo, l'd definitely recommend this shampoo.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Native vanilla cream and pumpkin shampoo is a good staple to add to your hair routine. It has a great scent. I personally really like it. It didn't leave my hair oily and after three days of not washing it still looked great. My hair felt so soft after using this and the matching conditioner. I also like that it is considered a clean product free of all the bad stuff. reviews.title: Native‚ÄØLimited‚ÄØEdition Vanilla‚ÄØCream‚ÄØ&‚ÄØPumpkin Moi
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] If you're in the mood for a fun, fall-themed shampoo that leans ‚Äúclean‚Äù in formulation, the Native Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Moisturizing Shampoo is a pleasant pick. It's not revolutionary but delivers a gentle balance: nice scent, decent cleansing, and a touch of hydration. Just don't expect it to replace your deep-conditioning routine if your hair is super needy.

reviews.title: Clean shampoo with wonderful fall scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have really enjoyed using the Native Shampoo in the Vanilla Cream and Pumpkin scent. I wasn't quite sure about the scent at the beginning but it really grew on me and the more I used it, I really loved it. The shampoo is a nice texture and it leaves my hair feeling clean and fresh. It is not heavy, nor does it strip my hair of its natural moisture. It is a very nice product which I will most likely rebuy.

reviews.title: Curly hair approved!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Starting of with the smell.. oh my gosh!!! This made my hair smell like fall. Perfect for the upcoming season. As a curly haired girl, I love that this doesn't have any silicones that will weigh down my curls because that is super important to me!

reviews.title: Easy to was off
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I recently started using Native's moisturizing shampoo and I'm really impressed by it! The shampoo cleans my scalp gently and feels clean, soft, and fresh afterwards. It's easy to wash off the residual, unlike some brand you have to wash extra long to wash it off. The vanilla cream & pumpkin scent makes me feel like it's that season already! It's sweet and warm, I love the hint of pumpkin smell! It lingers just enough without being overwhelming you with the smell. Love it!

reviews.title: Effective
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Native Shampoo in the Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin scent is a delightful seasonal treat for your hair. The fragrance is warm, cozy, and comforting‚Äîlike a blend of sweet vanilla and spiced pumpkin pie. Beyond the amazing scent, this shampoo does a great job of gently cleansing without stripping moisture. It's made with clean, simple ingredients and is free from sulfates, parabens, and silicones, which helps maintain your hair's natural balance and shine. The formula lathers well and leaves your hair feeling soft, light, and refreshed. It pairs beautifully with the matching conditioner for an even smoother finish. Perfect for fall or anytime you want a touch of indulgence, Native's Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Shampoo turns your everyday routine into a luxurious, aromatic experience.

reviews.title: Autumn in the bottle
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love the Native Vanilla & Pumpkin Cream Moisturizer Shampoo and Conditioner! The scent is warm, cozy, and perfect without being overpowering. My hair feels so soft, nourished, and hydrated after every wash, and it has a beautiful natural shine. I also love that Native uses clean ingredients, so I feel good about what I'm putting on my hair. The formula is lightweight yet moisturizing, leaving my hair smooth and manageable without weighing it down. This has quickly become one of my favorite seasonal must have

reviews.title: Love it
